c74object.name: abc.adcinput~
c74object.description: abc.adcinput~ is an abstraction for a mono adc~ input with possible dc filtering. The bpatcher can accept three default values as arguments.

attribute.name: channel
attribute.digest: the channel number of the adc
attribute.description: [ONLY IN INSPECTOR] first argument is the the channel number of the adc.

attribute.name: gain
attribute.description: [ONLY IN INSPECTOR] the init level in dB

attribute.name: dc-filter
attribute.digest: the enabling of the dc filtering (1/0)
attribute.description: [ONLY IN INSPECTOR] the enabling of the dc filtering (1/0)
